mapper.insert: insert into voyageone_ims.ims_bt_product ( channel_id, cart_id, code, num_iid, product_code, main_product_flg, product_type, publish_status, created, creater, modified, modifier ) VALUES ( #{channel_id}, #{cart_id}, #{code}, #{num_iid}, #{product_code}, #{main_product_flg}, #{product_type}, '1', #{created}, #{creater}, #{modified}, #{modifier} ) on duplicate key update num_iid = #{num_iid}, product_code = #{product_code}, main_product_flg = #{main_product_flg}, product_type = #{product_type}, publish_status = '1'
